seo.title: Portfolio of Kat Keilty
seo.description: With 10+ years transforming processes and empowering teams, I make technology work for people, not the other way around.

highlight1.title: Highlights | Business Improvement
highlight1.description: Delivered significant savings with measurable improvements in delivery (+15%), profit (+22%), efficiency (+11%), and customer satisfaction (-88% complaints).

highlight2.title: Highlights | Team Development
highlight2.description: Delivered 500+ training hours across 200+ sessions, supporting management and employees across multiple sites. Trained ISO auditors and onboarded staff members.

highlight3.title: Digital Transformation | Business Analyst
highlight3.description: Large-scale multi-site digital transformation, coordinating with francophone partners and consultants. Implementation of NetSuite ERP, Fabric, and supporting softwares. Led cross-functional process coordination efforts.

highlight4.title: CRM Implementation | Subject Matter Expert
highlight4.description: Supported deployment of a new CRM system, resulting in rapid adoption and measurable business impact in first year.

highlight5.title: QMS Implementation | Project Manager
highlight5.description: Replaced aging quality management database with modern system while maintaining business continuity and driving measurable quality improvements.

highlight6.title: M365 Platform Rollout | Super User
highlight6.description: Supported bilingual M365 deployment across sites for cross-cultural adoption and effective use of new collaboration tools.

prelco.description: Manage software implementation projects and build bilingual tools and resources. Lead ISO 9001/14001 audits while improving processes with data driven insights.

beclawat.description: Manage standards, documentation, and QMS database for 45+ staff. Streamline communication through Power BI and Power Automate. Audit ISO 9001 compliance and onboard/train staff with focus on quality.

athabasca.degree: Bachelor of Science, Computing and Information Systems Major
athabasca.description: Database management, Data structures and algorithms, Programming, Systems analysis and design, Scientific research, Math and Statistics, Development, management, and optimization of IT systems across sectors.

cqpa.name: ASQ | Certified Quality Process Analyst (CQPA)
cqpa.body: CQPA Body of Knowledge: Quality Concepts and Tools, Problem Solving and Improvement, Data Analysis, Customer-Supplier Relations, Corrective and Preventive Action (CAPA)

lssbb.name: CSSB | Lean Six Sigma Black Belt (LSSBB)
lssbb.body: Six Sigma Body of Knowledge: Team leadership & dynamics, DMAIC model, Hypothesis testing, Design of Experiment

bida.name: CFI | Business Intelligence & Data Analyst (BIDA)
bida.body: Advanced Excel, Power BI, Power Query, Power Pivot, SQL, Tableau, Python. Statistical analysis, business intelligence, data science principles.

iso.name: BRC | ISO 9001:2015 & 14001:2015 Internal Auditor
iso.body: Internal Audits, ISO Standards, Interviewing, Process Improvement, Corrective and Preventive Action (CAPA)

fmea.name: BRC | Failure Modes and Effects Analysis AIAG & VDA FMEA Training
fmea.body: Quality (ISO 9001), Automotive (IATF 16949), Manufacturing & Operations, Process Improvement
